attributes.action: keep Shaker Aamer out of the UK.... please trust our allies and accept this man is a threat to our western way of life.
attributes.additional_details: Shaker Aamer is deemed to be a dangerous and unacceptable being by our allies the Americans, please do everything to ensure and support the  foreign office in making sure that to Shaker Aamer is excluded and prevented from ever re-entering the United Kingdom for the safety and security of all our citizens.
